description: Crowdcube, Britain's leading platform, has passed £200 million raised on its platform since launch in 2011.
title: 22 biggest UK crowdfunding campaigns of 2016
title_page: 22 biggest UK crowdfunding campaigns of 2016 - Business Insider
text:
Crowdcube cofounder and CMO Luke Lang. Crowdcube 2016 has been another strong year for crowdfunding in the UK with Crowdcube, Britain's leading platform, passing the milestone of £200 million ($253 million) raised over its platform since inception.
Off3r, a platform that aggregates investment opportunities across peer-to-peer (P2P) and crowdfunding platforms, has pulled together a list of the biggest crowdfunding campaigns this year in Britain. The company says over £170 million has been raised through crowdfunding in Britain up to October this year.
The biggest raises cover everything from healthcare to brewing. Check out the top 22 below:
